title: Experiencing unchangeable high ping
body: So until two weeks ago, ive been playing through asia on the oce server having an average of 140 ping. Now it doubled and im having a constant 290 ping that never drops. Funny thing is that my main is on na, and i have around 30 ping less than usual from the previous 240. If someone cold help me id be really happy thanks!

replies.body:
Hey there, 

Could you please download [WinMTR](http://downloads.sourceforge.net/project/winmtr/WinMTR-v092.zip) and run a traceroute to the following IP address (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes), export the results as text and reply back with them (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this.)

>103.240.227.5

Could I also get you to run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/) and post back with a link to your results page.

You mentioned you were connecting from Asia? Where specifically? your problems may be being caused by the issue described by Agent Mindstar [here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/GYiftAVf-is-anyone-getting-massive-lag-that-wont-stop?comment=00010000).

http://pastebin.com/3j0p6PrD

heres the pastebin, i run javascript on chrome but it doesnt work for some reason so i cant do the icsi analysis.

I looked at the post and yes i do live in HK so maybe thats the problem, thanks for the help!
Looks to be, the best bet for you right now is to just wait it out.

me and my friends we are playing from asia as well. the ping was so fine we dont reli had problem with lagging and stuff. yet, until the recent updated patches, we started to troubling with high ping (which doesnt seem likely to decrease any time soon) and we cant play smoothly. i hope rito can fix...............{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
